Government starts social programs and starts taxing the producers at high rates, gives lots of money to losers and foreigners, and the wholes system blows up.  We are close to blowing up now. We create billionaires by the dozens but at the same time we have ever increasing poverty and homelessness, a struggle middle class and an inability (or unwillingness) to provide universal healthcare for our citizens.

Every city, county, state, and country is in competition for talent and investment. America has been winning that competition for over 200 years due to its system that encourages ingenuity, effort, and risk. It is a system every other country is free to copy - if they are so bold - and we tamper with it at our peril.

description: John C Hill  shared a memory. John C Hill  ·  April 1, 2016  ·  The morel of the story:

John C Hill  shared a memory. Haunting image from a glass plate negative found in an old glass plate camera from south-central Illinois... John C Hill  ·  March 29, 2016  ·  I gave a friend an old 4x5 glass plate camera to market on eBay. It has its original case; the mahogany and brass camera; and two wooden film holders. Inside on ... e of the film holders was a negative image. We eventually figured how to extract what was a glass negative. Here it is through the magic of Photoshop for you to view. Incidentally, this was my dad's camera, so image was probably taken in central Illinois. I should start a rumor that it's young Abe Lincoln.   See More

Rhonda Dunker  is with  Gizzy Whicker  and  3 others . Cancer .....this crappy disease has killed too many people that I loved....unlike others this will be a small request not leading to the elimination of the friends of my list. Given that I have a personal interest in the effects of cancer, I want to see who reads and who shares without reading it! If you have read everything, select "likes", so that I can thank you in your profile. I know that a large percentage of you won't, but my true friends are going to do it. Please, in honor of someone who died, or has cancer, or even had cancer. Everyone says: "if you need anything, don't hesitate, I'll be there for you"..., so I'm gonna make a bet, without being pessimistic, I'd like to know which of my friends and my family will put this on their FB timeline. You have to copy and paste (do not share)!!! I want to know who I can count... and I'm sure the number is less than 25. Write "done" in the comments when you do it! This is the month to raise awareness of this disease. I did it for myself and someone very special !  We all know someone who has fought this disease, or who is fighting against this evil now. Thank you.  Copy and paste... do not share

description: Chris Garrett  added  5 new photos . PLEASE SHARE!  It doesn't matter where you live, this needs to be shared!  The police and FBI are looking for help identifying the man in the picture below. He is a suspect in the double homicide of the two young teenage girls shown here (Libby and Abby) that occurred in Delphi, IN on Feb 13th.   UPDATE 7/17/2017 - SUSPECT STILL AT LARGE - PLEASE KEEP SHARING!    UPDATED TO INCLUDE COMPOSITE SKETCH FROM FBI. "The person depicted in the composite sketch is described as a white male between 5’6” to 5’10”, weighing 180 to 220 pounds, with reddish brown hair, eye color unknown. This sketch depicts a hat that may not be accurate.  We ask that you focus on the person’s facial features."  DO NOT POST PICTURES OR NAMES OF PEOPLE YOU THINK IS THIS SUSPECT IN THE COMMENTS... SEND ALL TIPS TO THE TIP LINE.  It is a defamation lawsuit waiting to happen.    There is an audio clip of a male suspect saying "Down the hill" that you can listen to in the link at the bottom of this post. One of the girls had the presence of mind to take a video. You can give an anonymous tip to the tip line. (Tip Information Contacts listed below) If you have ANY information... or even if you THINK it sounds like or looks like someone you know or are acquainted with, PLEASE don't hesitate to contact the tip line. SOMEBODY knows who this is, so please help spread the word to help identify this person so there are no more victims! NOTE:  There might be more than person involved and the voice may or may not be the guy in the photo so if you recognize either, please don't hesitate to contact the tip line.  Audio file of suspect's voice:  https://secure.in.gov/isp/files/Delphi_male_voice_loop.mp3  Tip Information Contacts:  e-Mail: Abbyandlibbytip@cacoshrf.com  Tip Line: (844) 459-5786  Indiana State Police: (800) 382-7537  Carroll County Sheriff: (765) 564-2413  More Info:   https://secure.in.gov/isp/delphi.htm  Information can be reported anonymously; however, the Indiana State Police, the FBI, and the Carroll County Sheriff’s Department have announced a reward for information leading to the arrest of the person or persons responsible for the homicides of Liberty German and Abigail Williams. The amount of the reward may be up to $230,000 depending upon the value of the information provided.
